lines.text: I'm sorry about her. It's a stinkin' business. But the job had to get done.
Why me? You got eleven good men in this office you could send in there.
You're the one I can spare.

[talking to his men about Fenner]
Remember his face. If it gets in your way, step on it.

[about Sandra]
How did she meet him? Walk up to him one day and say "I'm a communist agent and I'm interested in what you're doing"?
I need a friend, old friend.
If you ever loved me, believe me and listen to me now. Don't die for a piece of paper. Don't let him kill you for that.
I love you. And I've always loved you.
